#InputFile:
#=========================================================
# 3d Lennard-Jones melt 

units lj 
atom_style atomic 

newton off 
lattice fcc 0.8442 
region box block 0 160 0 160 0 160 
create_box 1 box 
create_atoms 1 box 
mass 1 2.0 

velocity all create 1.4 87287 loop geom 

pair_style lj/cut 2.5 
pair_coeff 1 1 1.0 1.0 2.5 

neighbor 0.3 bin 
neigh_modify delay 0 every 20 check no 
fix 1 all nve 
thermo 10 

run 1000 
#=========================================================
